original_text: Seven days shall ye eat unleavened bread; even the first day ye shall put away leaven out of your houses: for whosoever eateth leavened bread from the first day until the seventh day, that soul shall be cut off from Israel.
korean_text: 너희는 이레 동안 무교병을 먹을지니 그 첫날에 누룩을 너희 집에서 제하라 무릇 첫날부터 일곱째 날까지 유교병을 먹는 자는 이스라엘에서 끊어지리라

sentences.original_text: Seven days shall ye eat unleavened bread
sentences.korean_translation: 칠 일 동안 너희는 누룩 없는 빵을 먹으리라

sentences.original_text: ye shall put away leaven out of your houses

sentences.korean_translation: 누구든지 누룩 있는 빵을 먹는 자는

sentences.original_text: from the first day until the seventh day
that soul shall be cut off from Israel
